name: Blankets & Wine Nairobi
description: East Africa’s most beloved music, fashion, and food festival. Enjoy live performances under the Nairobi sun.

name: Safari Rally Kenya 2025
description: Experience the adrenaline of the WRC Safari Rally as it returns to Kenya’s breathtaking Naivasha terrain!

name: The Kenyan Fashion Story 2025
description: Celebrate Kenya’s creative culture and design talent with top models, designers, and stylists.

name: Koroga Festival
description: A fusion of African music, food, and art bringing together diverse cultures in one colorful experience.

name: Nairobi Restaurant Week 2025
description: Savor world-class cuisines as Nairobi’s finest restaurants showcase special menus and experiences.

name: Ghetto Classics All Stars Concert
description: An inspiring evening of orchestral music by the talented Ghetto Classics youth orchestra.

name: Mashujaa Rugby Sevens
description: Kenya’s top rugby talent competes in a thrilling 7s tournament — food, fun, and sport all in one!

name: CIO100 Symposium & Awards 2025
description: Kenya’s premier tech and innovation leadership event celebrating the region’s top CIOs and digital excellence.

name: Beneath the Baobabs Festival 2025
description: Celebrate New Year’s Eve with Kenya’s biggest music and arts festival on the stunning Kilifi coast.

name: Tusker OktobaFest 2025
description: Kenya’s biggest beer and music festival celebrating local artists, DJs, and authentic Kenyan culture.
